quote: Every year, he would try to buy an investment property... in 30 years, you got 15, 20 of them paid in full and you're creating your own retirement.
why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable strategy for wealth building.
suggested_hook: Want to build wealth through real estate? Here's a simple strategy.

quote: I cannot beat them with the fancy car, but I'll build them with my kindness, my care, my knowledge, and ability to perform.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that success is shown through material possessions.
suggested_hook: Think you need a fancy car to succeed in real estate? Think again.
